AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.intro: Here is a litte background about me
AboutMe.details: I am a dedicated and experienced Full-Stack Web Developer with a strong proficiency in TypeScrip, React Js and node js frameworks (Koa, express) and diverse modern technologies and librairies besides Other than the basic knowledge i have in other languages : Python, C# and Java. and list of technologies i worked with. I have Experience in writing clean, maintainable code and optimizing existing codebases to improve performance and reduce load times. Besides Proven ability to develop and apply best practices to ensure efficient and scalable web solutions swiftly without compromising quality. Skilled in leveraging frameworks, libraries, and tools to accelerate development cycles while ensuring robust performance. My commitment to learning programming and my enthusiasm for software development drive since i was young help to gain more expertise and deliver high-quality code, user-focused hybrid applications.
